subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Pavel Datsyuk scored twice and Petr Mrazek had 44 saves in his N.H.L. playoff debut to help Detroit win Game 1 of its Eastern Conference opening-round series.
snippet: Pavel Datsyuk scored twice and Petr Mrazek had 44 saves in his N.H.L. playoff debut to help Detroit win Game 1 of its Eastern Conference opening-round series.
